22+ yrs of technical and management expertise covering Designing, Development, Implementation & Operations 
and Support with startups to global cos 
 
Domains - Security, Cloud, Datacenter, Infra, Microservices, Unified Communications (UC) - Video - VoIP - Contact 
center, Telecom, VAS, IoT, AI/ML 
 
Functions / Areas - Engg Management, Technical Solution Architect, Product Test & Automation, Software 
Development, Devops/OPS, Support, Presales 
           
Highlights 
Subject matter & hands-on expertise on  400+ products and solutions - Cloud,Security,UC,Video,Telecom 
Large scale OSS service delivery & project initiation with Fortune500 companies 
Leadership and management of  large teams,  complete lifecycle - presales to support ($250MM) 
Created CoE (Center of Excellence) in Telecom, IPTV and UC domains , 400+ RFCs, 500+ IPR analysis 
Full stack - Product testing , Systems , Development, opensource specialist

Created CoE (Center of Excellence) in Telecom, IPTV and UC domains , 400+ RFCs, 500+ IPR analysis 
Full stack - Product testing , Systems , Development, opensource specialist 
Large scale - R&D labs (1000+ nodes), Product automation, Performance optimizations, NFR  
Engagement with 100+ SME/Enterprises (USA)  - Presales/BD/Proposals, Design, Solutions, Trials/Deployments 
    
 
           
 
 
Consultant / Director / Sol Architect - IND/USA              CAccess/Dell  - Engineering Lead   - USA

   Shri  Balla

Functions 
Engg Management / Function Head  / Solution Architect (Systems) / Technology Consultant  
 
 Consultative Business , Development & Integration services with TCO, ROI, CAPEX/OPEX strategies 
Building full stack systems from scratch to scale with Servers, Cloud, Datacenter, Security, Network, UC, Web 
Translates customer needs into business and technology solutions, CEO/CTO/CIO level advisory 
Thought leadership , business transformation , aligning business needs to engineering 
Proposals, presales, Master SOW, cross business opp, global teams, usecases , GAP/SWOT, competition, custom 
solutions, vendor evaluation, POC,  MVP, contract negotiation 
Entrepreneur experience & spirit, resourceful, experimental, flexible 
 
 End-to-end Program/Project/Product cycle mgmt, multiple BU, ollaboration with top management & teams.

roadmap , AOP/Budgets, benchmarks, metrics, CoE, transition management

stack selection, vendor/contractor/supplier mgmt, scaling geo-diverse cross-functional teams, matrix org 
Planning, scheduling and delivery with problem solving and result oriented approach, costing, hiring, onsite-
offshore outsourcing model, portfolio roadmaps, initiatives, large scale project initiation from scratch, risks and 
mitigation, appraisals & compensation reviews, KRAs, audits & compliances, CMMI L5 ,CSAT, ESAT, SLAs 
 
 Technical leadership with large scale and complex  project solutions spanning multiple domains & platforms

Research industry trends, evaluate and propose technology solutions with CAPEX, OPEX and ROI estimates

alignment,  risk estimation, compliances, DR, GRC (IT security), data-driven decisions, long-term strategies, POC 
 
Product Test , Automation, Dev/OPS & Support 
QA processes, Review  test strategy, test plans - Functional , Test Automation, TDD/BDD,

Design & Development

Full SDLC - Requirement traceability matrix, SME level  understanding of the business logic,  create architecture +

assembly , design patterns , development frameworks, code reviews, POC, object oriented designs, algorithms , 
API creation, software performance tuning,  bugfixing, unit/integration testing,  testtool/stub development, 
mentoring, best practices like 12-factor apps, SDLC methodologies - Lean, Agile, Scrum.

Competencies / Domain Areas & Systems  
 
 
 Security 
 
Function – Solution Architecting,  Deployment, Management/SPOC, BD, Devops, Development - licensing, 
monitoring, correlation, integration, scripting 
 
Best practices / benchmarks /compliances -  OWASP top 10, CWE top 25 , CIS top 20, CSA, CSF, NSCA, SOX, ASD, 
SANS, ISO 27001, NIST 800-53, FEDRAMP, FISMA 
 
Pentest / red teaming with injections/sqli/command/code, XSS, memory - overflows/pointers, de/serializations, 
csrf, xsrf, cache - dns/arp, ciphers, privilege escalation, data/info exposure,  volumetric/protocol/app attacks, 
DDOS, fuzzing, brute force (forms), enumerations, beacons, C2 tools/techniques, cyber kill chain 
 
Mitigations / blue teaming for OWASP, CIS, CWE , ddos, server /firewall  tuning, yara rules, WAF/modsecurity

intelligence & analysis, Vulnerability management, non-signature based strategies, reverse engg
